Reaching Our  
Full Potential  
Through Teamwork
PILLAR 3
As aligned, capable, 
and engaged teams, we 
come together to deliver 
exceptional long-term value for 
all our stakeholders—including our 
employees, customers, shareholders, 
communities and society.
We do this by embracing diversity, equity & 
inclusion; prioritizing employee health & safety; 
making a positive impact in the communities where 
we operate; and providing a secure workplace that 
develops and leverages the capabilities of our associates.
